definition: (in early CCP propaganda) United States (as an imperialist nation)/(in more recent times) a neutral, colloquial term for the United States
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: I believe China's Military is catching up with the US.
sentences.chinese: 我相信土鱉軍力接近美帝。

sentences.english: For the Chinese, the United States looks increasingly like a banana republic by comparison.
sentences.chinese: 對天朝子民，美帝乍看之下，愈來愈想一香蕉共和國。

definition: United States/name of a country that formerly existed near Samarkand
(coll.) an American/person from the United States
Australia (slang term reflecting a perception of Australia as something of a backwater)
UK (slang term reflecting a perception of UK as decadent for its attitudes toward homosexuality)

pinyin: Mei3 li4 jian1 He2 zhong4 guo2

definition: island nation (sometimes refers specifically to Japan)
Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect)/(Tw) surname Trump
